text:
you are the ruler of your life you're the one on 
the throne calling the shots it might not seem

like this all the time your parents might try to 
pressure you into doing certain things but they

are no longer on the throne now you call the shots 
which means you determine whether or not you win

or lose if you feel like a loser it means you've 
been on a losing streak you've been making wrong

decisions and they're haunting you replaying in 
your head making you believe and feel like an

actual loser to combat this all you have to do 
is start winning but of course this is easier

said than done it's pretty hard to make the right 
decisions and to do the right things especially

in this rapidly changing world of ours what's the 
right thing to study the right thing to invest in

the right diet the right way to live life there 
are so many choices we have to make in life

how do we increase our chances of making the right 
ones well every great ruler has a great court a

wise and diverse council of advisors people that 
you can go to for advice and motivation whenever

you have to make a major decision if you want 
to stop feeling like a loser you must surround

yourself with the right people today i'm going 
to tell you the types of people you must have

on your council and where to find them first we 
have the fortune teller if someone is right about

the future more than 80 percent of the time they 
are a fortune teller these people either have a

great understanding of human nature are really 
good with numbers or have access to information

before others this allows them to spot trends and 
uncover truths that everyone else is oblivious to

you see what's funny about the world is that 
the masses are usually wrong most people are

just copying what others are doing or what the 
media tells them to do fortune tellers on the

other hand come to their own conclusions based 
on all the data that they process in the big old

brain of theirs people like this are very rare you 
probably won't find any in real life but luckily

we have the internet so we can follow them online 
some examples of fortune tellers that i watch like

a hawk are Naval Ravicant who is really good at 
spotting tech trends Pentoshi who is a twitter

personality that's good at reading the crypto 
markets and Neil howe the author of "the fourth

turning" who basically predicted all of the crises 
that the world is facing today it's important to

have more than one fortune teller on your council 
so that you can see multiple perspectives about

the future this will not guarantee that you make 
the right choice but it certainly does increase

your chances the second type of person you need 
on your council is the monk monks are the most

disciplined people that you know this is someone 
who sticks to every good habit you can think of

and still manages to have the time to outwork 
everyone else the monk is someone you need not

for the advice they give but because simply 
being near one will motivate you to get your

life together you see not taking action on the 
right move is the same as making the wrong move

and monks help prevent this now unlike the fortune 
teller the monk is someone you need to keep close

fortune tellers only need to be visited once a 
month their predictions often don't come true for

years on the other hand speaking with a monk for 
just five minutes will immediately motivate you

some good examples of monks are David goggins and 
Jocko both of which are navy seals but ideally you

should find a monk in real life because it's more 
motivating when you are closer to one if you have

a hard time finding people like this you could 
consider joining our discord community where there

are tons of people building habits and trying to 
be more productive i will link to how you can join

in the description box below next up we have the 
expert the expert is a trained professional who

focused many years of their life on a specific 
subject most experts act like mercenaries

traveling from kingdom to kingdom doing their 
best to help rulers in exchange for coin the

reason you want to have experts on your council is 
because it's literally their job to help you win

some examples of experts are lawyers accountants 
doctors and financial planners these people have

seen thousands of scenarios play out with hundreds 
of other rulers so they have a knack of being able

to spot the right move one very important thing 
to note though is that being an expert does not

mean they know the right move a hundred percent 
of the time experts are often deceived which is

why it's best to listen to multiple experts with 
different opinions before making a major move

now there is a very specific type of expert that 
is extremely beneficial to have on your council

and that's a therapist a therapist is an expert 
of the mind someone who helps you think about the

way you think this is incredibly important because 
our thoughts literally create the reality that we

live in you could have a terrible life but still 
feel happy if your mindset is good enough which is

why this episode was sponsored by better help if 
you've been having a hard time reaching the goals

you want in life it's a good idea to speak with 
someone to help organize your thoughts and better

help is perfect for this now just to clarify 
this is not a crisis line this is a professional

therapy service that is done securely online 
worldwide the sign up process is very easy as you

can see here they will assess your needs and match 
you up with a licensed professional to speak with

all within 48 hours you can sign in anytime 
send a message to your therapist or schedule

another session whenever you want if there's ever 
a need to switch therapists to find a better fit

you can do so for free better help is much more 
affordable than traditional therapy and they even

offer financial aid for those in need better help 
has a special offer today where you'll get 10 off

your first month just go to betterhelp.com forward 
slash improvement pill that's better h-e-l-p and

join over a million people who are currently 
using the platform the next type of person you

need on your council is the shaman the shaman 
is someone who is spiritual and extremely open

to new experiences and ideas the real shamans 
of the past and many great shamans of today

often use substances or meditation to access 
different states of mind in order to explore such

ideas the reason shamans are important is because 
they help us become flexible the greatest rulers

are the ones that are open to all ideas no matter 
how strange or unconventional they may sound

often times the best move is a move that sounds 
so foreign that most shrug it off as nonsense it

might be something that goes against all of their 
beliefs about how the world works fortune tellers

tell you what might happen next monks motivate 
you to take action experts watch your back to

make sure you don't make mistakes shamans open up 
your mind so when you come across the right choice

you're more willing to believe that it might be 
the right one remember people who are not flexible

with their thinking are more likely to fail in 
life because the game is constantly changing some

examples of great shamans are philosophers like 
lao tzu alan watts and douglas adams who happens

to be elon musk's favorite philosopher finding 
a shaman in real life can be difficult they're

usually that one quirky person that we know who's 
always doing or thinking about something new every

time we bump into them so if you can find one 
keep them close and finally we have the challenger

the challenger someone who likes to debate and 
challenge your ideas they enjoy pointing out

potential flaws in your thinking to which you 
will be forced to come up with a way to prove

them wrong countering their statement if you 
cannot counter then it means that you do not have

a full understanding of this move that you think 
is the right one which is very useful as it shows

you which areas you need to do more research on 
challengers are quite common i know dozens of them

in real life the problem is that it's tough to 
find one who uses facts instead of emotions as a

way to debate most people nowadays on social media 
will attack the person making the argument instead

of the logic and you also want to find one who can 
identify false information many challengers who

do use facts and logic to push back on ideas are 
unable to see how data and news is often corrupted

things like propaganda and manipulated studies 
are far more common than most think some examples

of amazing challengers are people like jordan 
peterson and sam harris although you're probably

not gonna find someone that's at this level in 
real life which is fine because watching a video

of them debate online can still show you flaws in 
your thinking and regularly having debates with

average skilled challengers in real life can still 
be very useful if you find a decent one keep them

close and share all of your planned moves with 
them to see what things they push back on so to

sum things up find advisors for your council and 
go to them when you have to make major decisions

in life this will increase your chances of winning 
in the game of life i hope this video was helpful

and again if you want to surround yourself with 
more of these types of people i suggest you check

out our patreon which will give you access to our 
discord community besides that guys stay tuned
